response.original_title: Morning Musume '24 Concert Tour Haru MOTTO MORNING MUSUME。FINAL
response.overview: Morning Musume '24 Concert Tour Haru MOTTO MORNING MUSUME。 (モーニング娘。'24 コンサートツアー春 MOTTO MORNING MUSUME。) is Morning Musume '24's spring concert tour. The regular tour took place from March 16 to May 19, 2024.  The tour finished on May 27 at Nippon Budokan with the Morning Musume '24 Concert Tour Haru MOTTO MORNING MUSUME。FINAL (モーニング娘。'24 コンサートツアー春 MOTTO MORNING MUSUME。FINAL). This concert was live streamed through Hulu Japan's pay-per-view service,[1] and was also available for live viewing in the cinemas across Japan.  The Nippon Budokan concert was released on DVD and Blu-ray on September 25, 2024. The Blu-ray also includes a live photo booklet and backstage videos.
response.title: Morning Musume '24 Concert Tour Haru MOTTO MORNING MUSUME。FINAL
